CustomField.description: Team Responsible: Sales Purpose: Strategic Imperatives or key business initiatives that are important to the customer
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Strategic Imperatives & key business initiatives that are critical to customer success. Ex. Anything enabling the organization to compete more effectively or secure more funding. -Any significant shifts in their instrument/consumable forecast and the cause? What is the financial impact? Which quarter does it impact? -Any large projects they are involved in (i.e. PopGen)? What is the current state of their involvement? What is the status of the project? -What are the customer's sales & marketing goals?
CustomField.label: Customer's Strategic Imperatives
